verbs.description: SCHUYLKILL COUNTY , Pa.-- A Schuylkill County man [V: is] wanted by U.S. Marshals for threatening President Donald Trump and other government officials . https://twitter.com/jessicaWNEP/status/1009406568083984384 U.S. Marshals are searching for Shawn Christy , 26 , of McAdoo .
